snippet: Given today’s economic uncertainties, many traditional corporate employees could benefit from learning the ropes of self-employment.
abstract: Alexandra Levit Preoccupations column holds that, given today's economic uncertainties, many traditional corporate employees could benefit from learning the ropes of self-employment and consulting.
lead_paragraph: Given today’s economic uncertainties, many traditional corporate employees could benefit from learning the ropes of self-employment.

headline.print_headline: The Rise Of the Independent Work Force
headline.seo: Independent Workers Are Here to Stay
headline.main: The Rise of the Independent Work Force
